title: Israeli strikes targeting Hamas military leader kill 90 in Gaza
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Saturday that “there is still no absolute certainty” that Mohammed Deif was killed.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Saturday that “there is still no absolute certainty” that Mohammed Deif was killed.

title: Who is Mohammed Deif, Hamas military commander targeted by Israel?
content: Israel’s military says it targeted Mohammed Deif, the commander of Hamas’s military wing, in a strike Saturday.
summary: Israel’s military says it targeted Mohammed Deif, the commander of Hamas’s military wing, in a strike Saturday.

title: Princess Kate will present trophy to men’s Wimbledon winner, palace says
content: It would be the second public appearance for Catherine, Princess of Wales, since announcing that she has cancer.
summary: It would be the second public appearance for Catherine, Princess of Wales, since announcing that she has cancer.

title: These are Hamas’s top leaders
content: The group has both a political and military wing. Some of its leaders are public figures while others operate in the shadows.
summary: The group has both a political and military wing. Some of its leaders are public figures while others operate in the shadows.

title: Asia’s richest man is hosting a ‘spectacular,’ ‘vulgar,’ star-studded wedding
content: Anant Ambani, Mukesh Ambani’s son, has married Radhika Merchant. Here’s what to know about the glitzy, glamorous and controversial wedding in Mumbai.
summary: Anant Ambani, Mukesh Ambani’s son, has married Radhika Merchant. Here’s what to know about the glitzy, glamorous and controversial wedding in Mumbai.

title: Germany is forcing some asylum seekers to work, when they just want real jobs
content: Germany’s debate over migrants and jobs comes against the backdrop of an economy in desperate need of new workers as the population ages.
summary: Germany’s debate over migrants and jobs comes against the backdrop of an economy in desperate need of new workers as the population ages.

title: Taliban tries reconciling science and religion in facing climate change
content: Afghanistan’s rulers, cut off from foreign assistance, are tackling climate change on their own while debating whether it is God’s doing or a foreign plot.
summary: Afghanistan’s rulers, cut off from foreign assistance, are tackling climate change on their own while debating whether it is God’s doing or a foreign plot.

title: Israel, Hamas inch closer to Gaza cease-fire deal, but gaps remain
content: Officials said that while Israel and Hamas appear closer to a cease-fire deal, new Israeli demands and disagreements over details are still at issue.
summary: Officials said that while Israel and Hamas appear closer to a cease-fire deal, new Israeli demands and disagreements over details are still at issue.

title: After abuse revelations, professors grapple with how to teach Munro
content: Alice Munro, Canada’s only Nobel laureate in literature, stayed with her husband after he admitted abusing her daughter. Canadians are now reassessing a national icon.
summary: Alice Munro, Canada’s only Nobel laureate in literature, stayed with her husband after he admitted abusing her daughter. Canadians are now reassessing a national icon.

title: After weeks of protests, Kenya’s president sacks his much reviled ministers
content: Just six weeks ago, President William Ruto was visiting the White House and basking as a top U.S. ally in Africa, but Kenya has since exploded with anti-corruption protests.
summary: Just six weeks ago, President William Ruto was visiting the White House and basking as a top U.S. ally in Africa, but Kenya has since exploded with anti-corruption protests.

title: U.S.-China rivalry enters a new sphere: Who can best carry a tune
content: A Chinese television show featuring live performances by Americans including Adam Lambert has audiences questioning the quality of domestic singers.
summary: A Chinese television show featuring live performances by Americans including Adam Lambert has audiences questioning the quality of domestic singers.

title: This Trader Joe’s seasoning is a hot item. In South Korea, it’s illegal.
content: Jars of Everything But the Bagel seasoning are being seized at the airport because they contain poppy seeds, which South Korean law classifies as a narcotic.
summary: Jars of Everything But the Bagel seasoning are being seized at the airport because they contain poppy seeds, which South Korean law classifies as a narcotic.

title: Delta apologizes for post disparaging attendants’ Palestinian flag pins
content: Delta said the now-deleted post, which appeared to sympathize with an X user who complained about cabin crew wearing the pins, “was not in line with our values.”
summary: Delta said the now-deleted post, which appeared to sympathize with an X user who complained about cabin crew wearing the pins, “was not in line with our values.”

title: NATO sets its sights on China
content: The explosion of the war in Ukraine and the increasingly global nature of security threats has thrust China into the spotlight.
summary: The explosion of the war in Ukraine and the increasingly global nature of security threats has thrust China into the spotlight.
